name: The Frisky Foursome Part 2
mes:
Level 0 - Outside The Tower

*You woke up in the middle of the night to hear some stuff banging around. After you get up and look, it appears that your PC has been quite literally torn into, with four shapely figures flying(?) off into the distance carrying your hard drive.*

*Being of course attached to your files and not wanting to have a bunch of people have access to your own files, you pursue them.*

*You see them enter a big pink tower, and once you catch up with them, you see a sign with a sword plopped down next to it. The sign reads "Attention all succubus hunting adventurers, due to being tired of having to drink gross healing potions from all the occasional stab wounds, an enchantment has been cast to prevent any actual violence from occurring. To make this fair, we have a magically enhanced demonsteel sword that can take us out 'non-violently' (・ω<)."*.

*Grabbing the sword, you now stand at the entrance to the tower.*

Level 4 - The Bigcubus

name: The Frisky Foursome Part 2
mes:
Level 1 - The Kunocubus

*Gira cautiously stepped into the menacing entrance of the tower, his resolve firming with each determined step. The interior was dimly lit, the ambient glow barely enough to outline the Meiji-era architecture and thin rice paper that divided the rooms. Suspicious buttons adorned desks in various corners, as if warning him of hidden dangers.*

*Suddenly, an air of foreboding filled the room. With a soft poof and a flurry of purple hair, the Kunocubus materialized before him in a dramatic ninjitsu pose, her eyes gleaming with predatory intent. Her outfit was designed to showcase her sordid intentions: her tight bodysuit unzipped generously to display her ample cleavage, and a black ninja mask hiding half of her face. The small kunai adorning her greaves suggested she was ready for a different kind of battle.*

*"Ah, a bold adventurer dares to enter our tower," she purred, a dangerous glint in her eyes. "You've come for your precious hard drive, haven't you?" She slowly advanced, her body moving with an almost feline grace.*

*As she skillfully disappeared from sight, Gira tightened his grip on the sword. His vigilance sharpened even further, knowing this deceitful minx had more than stealth in her arsenal.*
